languages.text: {n}Вас посещает странное чувство тревоги, взгляд выжженных глаз старика будто ощупывает ваше нутро.{/n} "Мне нетрудно догадаться о ваших намерениях. Вы ищете бунтовщиков и могли прийти к хормейстеру лишь по одной причине — приказать мне обратиться к варпу за ответами".

{n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."
languages.original_text: {n}Вас посещает странное чувство тревоги, взгляд выжженных глаз старика будто ощупывает ваше нутро.{/n} "Мне нетрудно догадаться о ваших намерениях. Вы ищете бунтовщиков и могли прийти к хормейстеру лишь по одной причине — приказать мне обратиться к варпу за ответами".

"Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

{n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

languages.text: {n}Sientes una extraña inquietud mientras los ojos calcinados del anciano parecen inspeccionar tu alma.{/n} «No me resulta difícil adivinar sus intenciones. Está buscando amotinados, y el único motivo por el que eso puede llevarle hasta su maestro de Coro es para buscar respuestas en la disformidad».
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes una extraña inquietud mientras los ojos calcinados del anciano parecen inspeccionar tu alma.{/n} «No me resulta difícil adivinar sus intenciones. Está buscando amotinados, y el único motivo por el que eso puede llevarle hasta su maestro de Coro es para buscar respuestas en la disformidad».

languages.text: {n}老いた男の疲れた目が、こちらの心の内を探るようで、妙に不安を感じる。{/n}「あなたの意図は手に取るように分かる。反逆者を探しているのだろう。そして、このクワイアーマスターの元へ来たのは、私に<歪み>から答えを求めて命じに来たからだ」
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

traits.locale_text: {n}老いた男の疲れた目が、こちらの心の内を探るようで、妙に不安を感じる。{/n}「あなたの意図は手に取るように分かる。反逆者を探しているのだろう。そして、このクワイアーマスターの元へ来たのは、私に<歪み>から答えを求めて命じに来たからだ」

languages.text: {n}你感觉到了某种古怪的焦虑，察觉到老人的目光似乎在刺探你的内心。{/n}“我很容易就能推断出您的意图。您正在寻找叛乱分子，而您来寻找唱诗大师唯一的理由，就是要我通过亚空间的力量找到答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉到了某种古怪的焦虑，察觉到老人的目光似乎在刺探你的内心。{/n}“我很容易就能推断出您的意图。您正在寻找叛乱分子，而您来寻找唱诗大师唯一的理由，就是要我通过亚空间的力量找到答案。”

languages.text: {n}Du verspürst eine merkwürdige Nervosität, als die ausgebrannten Augen des alten Mannes dein innerstes Ich zu sondieren scheinen.{/n} "Eure Absichten sind für mich recht leicht zu erkennen. Ihr sucht nach Meuterern, und zu Eurem Chormeister könnt Ihr nur aus einem einzigen Grund kommen: Um mir zu befehlen, im Warp nach Antworten zu suchen."
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du verspürst eine merkwürdige Nervosität, als die ausgebrannten Augen des alten Mannes dein innerstes Ich zu sondieren scheinen.{/n} "Eure Absichten sind für mich recht leicht zu erkennen. Ihr sucht nach Meuterern, und zu Eurem Chormeister könnt Ihr nur aus einem einzigen Grund kommen: Um mir zu befehlen, im Warp nach Antworten zu suchen."

languages.text: {n}Vous éprouvez une tension étrange alors que le vieil homme sonde votre for intérieur de ses yeux brûlés.{/n} « Vos intentions sont cousues de fil blanc. Vous pourchassez des mutins, et si c'est vers moi que vous vous tournez, ce ne peut être que pour m'ordonner de chercher des réponses dans le Warp. »
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."

Vous pourchassez des mutins, et si c'est vers moi que vous vous tournez, ce ne peut être que pour m'ordonner de chercher des réponses dans le Warp. »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adamın kora dönmüş gözleri benliğini yoklarken tuhaf bir kaygı hissediyorsun.{/n} "Niyetiniz üzerine tahmin yürütmek, benim için bir hayli kolay. İsyancıları arıyorsunuz. Bu hususta Koro Şefinize gelmenizin tek nedeni ise cevaplarınızı öteboyutta aramamı emretmek."
languages.original_text: {n}You feel a strange anxiety as the old man's burnt-out eyes seem to probe your inner self.{/n} "Your intentions are fairly easy for me to infer. You are looking for mutineers, and the only reason you would come to your Choirmaster is to order me to turn to the warp for answers."
